name: Ibis Frankfurt City West

reviews.text: Hotel is located about 10 minutes from the city center, by U bahn 6 or 7. Friendly check-in, comfortable room, typical Ibis standard. Flat screen TV small clean bathroom. Wifi is not free in rooms but is free in the lobby, they also have a computer and printer. Bar is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks. A large breakfast is provided at 10 euros, you may eat all you want. Beware that the Accor wifi provider in Germany is having a virus problem, someone was able to block certain web sites. Hopefully this problem will be resolved quickly. If you need full access to the internet then perhpas Accor in Germany is not the answer at this time
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: It is getting better all the time.If I had to say something that I always find poor is there is never enough soap in the containers I learned to bring my own.The rooms are always clean the service is A1 it has been my choice of hotel since 1998.
reviews.title: Love this Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed there several times, for the reasonable price and nice location (near where I want to go and the U-bahn station). Have not been disappointed. Used the bar for evening drinks every night. Wifi was free at the lobby but charged in the room, but that was not too expensive. All in all, not bad.
reviews.title: Good hotel at nice location

reviews.text: This was my second time in Frankfurt, and this time I tried to save a little by staying outside of the city. This hotel met all my expectations as a solid Ibis Hotel. If one is familiar with the chain, then it is exactly what you should expect. Nothing fancy, just a place to rest your head while on business or otherwise. It is outside of the city a ways, but the nearby U-Bahn line is a quick way to get to the center of the city.
reviews.title: For the price, a good Frankfurt Hotel
Constant good quality
reviews.text: I have stayed at the Ibis Frankfurt City West several times over the past ten years. It is conveniently located, close to the underground lines 6 and 7 which bring you right to the Westend and the City Centre. The hotel is well equipped and maintained, b'fast and bar facilities are of a good standard. The free Internet access in the lobby and throughout the hotel is something which could be improved.

Foreign travellers by car, beware: the first day, I had left my car outside the hotel (free parking), but I got a ticket because my foreign-registered car is not equipped with a filter against fine particles. That, of course, has nothing to do with the hotel: next time, I'll bring my car right away to the hotel parking.
reviews.title: Very Good Value For Money
Quiet Room - but a "Ryanair" address
reviews.text: Spent a total of 6 nights here in May 2012 while using Frankfurt as a hub to explore Europe..

Hotel was clean and staff helpful. Room was large and comfortable. It is conveniently located near a Train line (U-Bahn), but quite a walk from the centre, but trains are so regular (every 5 mins) this is not a problem.
reviews.title: Adequate Budget Hotel
Good budget class hotel
reviews.text: Note there is nothing near this hotel, so eating in the evening is very limited. The wifi in rooms is not free and patchy, but lobby wifi is free.

reviews.title: loved it
reviews.text: Ensure that the hotel removes the holding deposit from your card, as this didn't happen until I rung them once I had returned home, and caused problems for me.

reviews.title: Great value for money
reviews.text: This is great hotel, and for the price I paid it was a steal. The room was basic, but very good standard. The room is on the small size, but for one, max two it is ok. Nice flat screen with cable and plenty of channels for everyone. The location is not as central as some people would like, but it is quick to get to from the airport, and the Messe is just a few minutes away with the U-Bahn. For the price I would not hesitate to stay here again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed only a night here, arriving late in the night, was perfect to get a good sleep, eat my breakfast and get going.
reviews.title: good value

reviews.text: The hotel looks a little outdated, but as mentioned for the price it was ok.
reviews.title: The poorest looking mid-range hotel I have ever seen in Europe

reviews.text: The room was as any other ibis hotel, clean and comfy enough.
reviews.title: a good solution for seasons, when a central hotel is too expensive

reviews.text: I was disappointed that they didnt had free wifi, and i needed to pay for it.
reviews.title: Hotel in the midst of overgrown weeds

description: The 2 star Ibis Frankfurt City West is 5 km from the main railway station and the city centre, the Palm Garden and the Senkenberg Museum. The nearest underground station is 150 m away, the airport is 20 km and the exhibition centre 2 km. The motorway is5 minutes away. The hotel offers 114 airconditioned rooms with WiFi and 2 meeting rooms for up to 50 people. Guests also enjoy the benefit of a 24 hour bar and a private pay car park.
